attributes.action: Bring back David Milliband as Labour Leader, on the pledge for an EU referendum
attributes.background: Britain has been placed into political turmoil. The people of Britain have lost confidence and trust in many of the leading politicians, both on the remain and leave side of the EU referendum. The Labour party is in disarray and the country is in need of a strong leader to bring people together.

rejection.details:
It’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
